caption.p: The 24 anatomical sites in the striatonigral and olivopontocerebellar regions examined in a comparison of MSA cohorts in Japan and the U.K. Put = putamen, Cau = caudate nucleus, GP = globus pallidus, SbN = substantia nigra, CBH = cerebellar hemisphere. This figure was reprinted from the reference no. 15, with permission from IOS Press.
